abstracts.cdata!:
In September 1988, Hurricane Gilbert,
            one of the most powerful this century, struck Jamaica,
            causing extensive damage to the whole island. The loan will
            disburse against a list of imports which has been designed
            to support the Government's reconstruction program. It
            will finance : (i) construction, building materials and
            equipment; (ii) transport equipment for public agencies;
            (iii) agricultural supplies; and (iv) equipment and
            materials for electric power restoration. The loan also
            includes appropriate mechanisms to : (i) ensure that
            implementation of the program components follow
            reconstruction standards ; (ii) review mechanisms to
            mitigate the impact of similar catastrophes; (iii) establish
            and monitor mechanisms for the low-income assistance
            programs; and (iv) coordinate the financing and
            implementation of the whole program on a continuing basis.
